Description: Medical problems force me to sell my NEW 2017, 6120T Players Edition Nashville. I've only been able to play it for a couple of hours. It’s in like new condition with no pick marks, scratches, dings or flaws of any kind. This guitar was built in December, 2017 finished and factory quality checked in March, 2018 and I purchased it in April, 2018, so it's less than one year old, virtually new! It’s a wonderful instrument with all the great Gretsch quality and sound. Includes the beautiful Gretsch gold woven strap, gold strap locks and black hard shell case. This is taken form the Gretsch website: “Designed from the ground up for modern players yet retaining all the timeless style that made the 6120 famous, the Players Edition Nashville with String-Thru Bigsby is a marvelous example of art and performance. Player-oriented features, wide, open sound and comfortable playability combine to create a playing experience like no other. Ideal for every song, every night, this Nashville is certain to become your go-to guitar. A treat for the eyes and ears, this guitar is a highly-tuned music machine—from the shining gold Schaller® locking tuning machines and gold G-arrow control knobs to the F-holes, gloss urethane finish and gold vintage thick plexi pickguard with Gretsch logo. Constructed with sterling fit and finish and an eye for detail, the Players Edition Nashville with String-Thru Bigsby is a marvel of modern instrument design." Includes Gretsch black deluxe hardshell case, gold strap locks, Gretsch strap and two sets of new strings. If you have trouble understanding Gretsch serial number codes I've included how it is done below. FYI: Reading Gretsch serial numbers is as follows, This Guitar: SN JT17123637First two digit numbers - year of production: 2017Second two numbers - production month: DecemberRemaining numbers are sequential yearly factory unit numbers.Final Factory Production Quality Control Department Card: Quality control inspector and date, March 27, 2018 Model Number 2401350822 Series: Gretsch® Professional Collection Family: Nashville® / G6120  Color: Orange Stain  Number of Strings: 6 Orientation: Right-Hand  Build: Hollow Body  Cutaway: Single Cutaway  Body Finish: Gloss Urethane Body Shape: Nashville® / G6120 Body Material: Laminated Maple Bracing: ML Bracing  Body Binding: White with B/W/B Purfling Body Back: Laminated Maple Body Top: Laminated Maple Neck Material: Maple Neck Finish: Gloss Urethane Neck Binding: White Scale Length: 24.6" (625 mm) Fingerboard Radius: 12" (305 mm) Fingerboard Material: Ebony Number of Frets: 22 Nut Width: 1.6875" (42.86 mm) Position Inlays: Neo-Classic™ Thumbnail Headstock: Late '50s Gretsch Neck Plate: NA Bridge Pickup: High Sensitive Filter'Tron™ Neck Pickup: High Sensitive Filter'Tron™ Controls: Volume 1. (Neck Pickup), Volume 2. (Bridge Pickup), Tone Pickup Switching: 3-Position Toggle: Position 1. Bridge Pickup, Position 2. Bridge and Neck Pickups, Position 3. Neck Pickup Pickup Configuration: Filter'Tron™ / Filter'Tron™  Bridge: Rocking Bar with Pinned Ebony Base  Products.facets.hardwareFinish: Gold Tailpiece: Bigsby® B6GP String-Thru Vibrato Tailpiece  Tuning Machines: Gotoh® Locking Pickguard: Gold Plexi with Black Gretsch® Logo Control Knobs: G-Arrow Included Accessories Included: 099-6411-000 G6241 16" Deluxe Hollow Body Hardshell Case, Black
Title: Gretsch 2017 - 6120 Nashville Players Edition
ConditionDescription: This guitar was built in December 2017 and purchased in April, 2018. It is in like new, pristine condition. No flaws, pick marks, scratches, dings or damage of any kind. Attached photos can't do justice to the beauty of this wonderful guitar.
